Articles.Content: I downloaded bd armory for ksp 1.3 and downloaded an m1 abrams craft form kerbalx and it said it needed bd armory and kerbal foundries which I had both of. But when I tried to load it in the sph it said I was missing the armor plates (keep in mind that the craft said it was made in 1.3) My question is, where do I download the armor plates for bd armory?

The armor plates are part of BDAc

Are you using this version?

https://github.com/PapaJoesSoup/BDArmory/releases/tag/v1.1.0-final
